list.name: Changes
list.comment: Task 3: implemented the makeCoffee method; now each class have it's own version of the making process, utilizing the one in the main Coffee class as a base; utilized the static factory method to create and customize coffee objects, that are then called in the main class (by casting), also all parameters are passed from main

changelist.name: Changes
changelist.comment: Day 1 task; created a simple class for items (aliens); and one that will store them in an array list to start the design process

task.summary: Day 2 task: created a separate class for the json parser; it will now read the test input file (json) and print out the aliens; also it will default to some values in case they were not provided
Day 3.1 Task; modified the parser to include classification v1 - it is only for testing purposes it will be updated in the next commit; just trying out the mapping function

Day 3.5-4 Task; added a classification based on score-matching; added all the criteria to the classification class (which will be updated); updated the universe class to contain all known species in their respective universe, and the method of getting them
Day 4.1 Task: Made printing changes so it would not printing the raw data parsed, but it would be neatly shown in the console (for the moment)
Day 4.2 Task: Now we can classify aliens from multiple json files
Day 5 Task: removed printing in the console; added writing to output files and pretty formatting
Task 0: restructured the directory; moved into separate modules for ease of acces later on
Task 1: created display class, with the obj attributes and the comparing methods; objects can be instantiated manually, then the program compares size area, ppi, and the best average.
Task 2: created FileReader and TextData classes; experimented with packages and importing them from one module to another; added the .txt file to be read.

Task 3: created the Assistant class; updated the main class from task1 to use lists; added the assist method to use the methods imported from the display class; added JOptionPane class to the main for pop-up functionality and better user experience.
Task 4: modified Main from task 2 to allow for multiple file paths as inputs; modified TextData to fix names of methods that were overlooked in previous commit
Task 1: Recreated the classes shown in the task description, while introducing the inheritance in the structure (the coffee class is the main parent at the moment, with 4 children).
Task 1.1: Fixed the class structures, since they were not exactly as described in the description, now they properly utilize the inheritance, and every class adds one field to the parent.

Task 2: Added constructors/getters to each class depending on the needs; added the printDetails method to print each coffee's details, utilizing inheritance, super classes and sub classes, overriding per class to add necessary fields.
Task 2.1: Refactored the code so it doesn't use any extra methods, only inheritance principles; now all parameters are given through main

Task 3: implemented the makeCoffee method; now each class have it's own version of the making process, utilizing the one in the main Coffee class as a base; utilized the static factory method to create and customize coffee objects, that are then called in the main class (by casting), also all parameters are passed from main

Day 2 task: created a separate class for the json parser; it will now read the test input file (json) and print out the aliens; also it will default to some values in case they were not provided

Task 3: created the Assistant class; updated the main class from task1 to use lists; added the assist method to use the methods imported from the display class; added JOptionPane class to the main for pop-up functionality and better user experience.
Task 4: modified Main from task 2 to allow for multiple file paths as inputs; modified TextData to fix names of methods that were overlooked in previous commit

Task 2: Added constructors/getters to each class depending on the needs; added the printDetails method to print each coffee's details, utilizing inheritance, super classes and sub classes, overriding per class to add necessary fields.
